```pseudocode
#| html-line-number: true
\begin{algorithm}
  \caption{Quicksort}
  \begin{algorithmic}
    \Procedure{Quicksort}{$A, p, r$}
      \If{$p < r$}
        \State $q = $ \Call{Partition}{$A, p, r$}
        \State \Call{Quicksort}{$A, p, q - 1$}
        \State \Call{Quicksort}{$A, q + 1, r$}
      \EndIf
    \EndProcedure
  \end{algorithmic}
\end{algorithm}
```
